=== Purpose ===
The Education Team will be creating quick start guides for Ubuntu / Kbuntu and software included with the distribution. The goal is to give users an easy to use two-sided sheet to help them start to use Ubuntu / Kbuntu and associated applications.

-----
Initial Ideas:
* Ubuntu (gnome) Quick Start Guide for Windows Users
* Open Office Word Processor Quick Start Guide for Office Users
* Open Office Spread Sheet Quick Start Guide for Office Users
* Open Office Presentation Quick Start Guide for Office Users
* Add / Remove Programs Quick Start Guide for New Users
* Aptitude Quick Start Guide for New Users
* Basic Terminal Commands Quick Start Guide for New Users
* Guide to Using and Understanding man pages for New Users
* (please add your ideas here)
